products.title: Vitra Blackout Slate Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Vitra Blackout Slate Grey Roller Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £7.91 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Vitra blackout slate grey fabric is a chic darker grey colour, it's sleek and stylish and will work beautifully within the home or office. Slate grey is bold enough to be used as a statement shade within your interior styling. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control. The quality of this fabric range is second to none and will provide a high quality finish to your interior style.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2145 Fabric Colour: Slate Grey Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.productdescription:
Embrace a fresh look with the clean lines and cool grey of the Vitra Blackout Vapour Grey Roller blind. Teamed with its impressive blackout functionality, this quality blind makes stylish window dressing simple. Add privacy and subtle tonal depths to the white of a minimalist bathroom, or coordinate with the charming pastel shades of a country style kitchen.

products.title: Vitra Zinc (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Vitra Zinc (Blackout) Blackout Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blackout Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 4115mm
 	Min Drop: 300mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

products.productdescription:
Our Vitra blackout slate grey fabric is a chic darker grey colour, it's sleek and stylish and will work beautifully within the home or office. Slate grey is bold enough to be used as a statement shade within your interior styling.
